import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useRouteMatch } from "react-router-dom"; import LoadingApi from "../../atom/LoadingApi"; import pageApi from "../../core/API/pageApi"; export default function CourseDetails() { //GET Data let [dataCourse, setDataCourse] = useState(); let routerMatch = useRouteMatch(); useEffect(() => { pageApi.courseDetail(routerMatch.params.slug).then((res) => { setDataCourse(res); console.log(res, "data"); }); }, [routerMatch.params.slug]); if (!dataCourse) return Kho hc ang loading; const { title, opening_time, count_video, long_description, } = dataCourse.data; return (
